about_the_game:
Puppy Pipy is for all dog lovers.
*We will donate part of profits to animal shelters, hope all of them have a sweet home.



About Puppy Pipy
Puppy Pipy - a video game for all the people who love dogs. The story starts when a 6 week old golden retriever puppy gets abandoned. A young boy finds him in a trash bin, and he decides to adopt this adorable puppy. Accidents occur, and they are forced to separate. Pipy’s exciting journey looking for his family and showcases the special bond between a dog and a boy are unbreakable . The story takes place in Los Angeles, 1940.


Real Physical Puzzle
Puppy Pipy is a platformer puzzle game created by Unity engine. We utilized & integrated this game engine’s physical properties. In order to provide different playing experiences we show the different physical properties in the 5 stages, in different core gameplay in each stage, which are gravity, bounce, rotation, fluid, and lift. These physical properties are almost the same as the real world, there is more than one way to beat each challenge, everyone can open their mind and find the fastest way and secret methods to solve all the puzzles they encounter in their journey.



Unique Skills of Puppy
Pipy is a smart puppy, even though there are many challenges in his journey, Pipy will use his smart brain and different skills to solve the puzzles. In each stage Pipy will get a unique item, such as Dog poop, tennis, Frisbee, and water gun, these items are very helpful to help Pipy overcome the challenge and defeat each enemy. In order to make our journey more fun and challenging, Pipy will learn many useful skills such double jump, super dash, gliding, and emergency evasions. If you can use emergency evasion in the right timing, Pipy will move to enemies and defeat them immediately, this skill can also help Pipy reach to many areas that he can’t get to in the normal situation.



Pipy and Friends
Pipy will meet many friends in his adventure. A black dog will feed Pipy when he is hungry. A hamster will help Pipy escape from capture. A mother duck will ask Pipy’s help to find her duckling. A kind grandmother will give Pipy advice. They are not just simply interacting with Pipy, but also teach & help Pipy survive.

short_description: Puppy Pipy is a 2D action puzzle platformer, each stage focuses on a specific physical property as its core gameplay, such as gravity, bounce, rotation, fluid, and lift. This game has a heartwarming story which is about a 6 week old golden retriever puppy named Pipy looking for his young owner.
